name: Form of Being Demo
description:
Description

Form of Being is a visual novel project about a community of queer Beings living their best lives in an inbetween realm known as Sanctuary.

This demo provides an introduction to the main characters, including the player character, who is an invisible person trying to navigate their first job and figure out who they want to be.

You might be interested in this game if you are looking for visual novel stories focused on themes of queer identities, self exploration, queer platonic relationships, and a setting where money isn't used and you can have a dragon boyfriend, an undead girlfriend, or a slime partner in crime.

----------

I hope you all enjoy this preview, and have a wonderful Pride month! ❤️💛💚💙💜
